test.name: Shopping-01

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to the given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.19/guides/caps/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | No | alias |

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify No Items Page and Go Shopping Button Is Visible
Page Should Contain Text
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Text
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Oh no! Your cart is empty. Fill it up with swag to complete your purchase.'.
kw.arg: Oh no! Your cart is empty. Fill it up with swag to complete your purchase.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page contains the element with the ``locator``.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and the webdriver session.

test.doc: POSITIVE - User clicks cart button → should see No items text

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Product Name" and @label="Sauce Labs Backpack - Black"]'.
xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Product Name" and @label="Sauce Labs Backpack - Black"]
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page contains the element with the ``locator``.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and the webdriver session.

test.doc: POSITIVE - User clicks go shopping button on no items page → should see products page

kw.name: Verify Product is on My Cart Page and Proceed To Checkout Button Is Visible
Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'accessibility_id=Sauce Labs Backpack - Black'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page contains the element with the ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'accessibility_id=Proceed To Checkout'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page contains the element with the ``locator``.

test.doc: POSITIVE - User selects product and clicks add to cart button, clicks cart button → should see proceed to checkout button and product on my cart page
